game_description: As an adventurer, youâ€™ve been cast away on a remote island by a fierce storm. Can you survive on and escape from it? Build your skill set for living in the wild, no matter it is crafting tools, forking fishes, hunting with bows, farming, or making shelters! Those will definitely help to realize your goal and build up the gears needed for your next challenge. Have great adventures to explore the cave, ocean and other islands where you may need to fight against malicious creatures and collect treasures as reward. No one knows what risks you'll have to solve till tomorrow. Join discord for tips and help: https://discord.gg/qMkyDn4NEM Try out free demo at https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/7067531616605210/
review_5: I love this game. Although it's tricky as what to do. Not much instructions or not enough room in backpack. But I still love it. How do you get the animal teeth to build the boat.
